metadata.Title: CVE-2023-20592 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Improper or unexpected behavior of the INVD instruction in some AMD CPUsmay allow an attacker with a malicious hypervisor to affect cache linewrite-back behavior of the CPU leading to a potential loss of guest virtualmachine (VM) memory integrity.

criterions.comment: amd64-microcode: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
